description:
Power On and Off WebOS LG TVs together with your PC.

This application (UI and service) controls LG WebOS TVs and displays.
New features:
- Apollo streaming support
Fixes and improvements:
- Fixed User Idle Mode compatibility with some UE5 games (e.g. Marvel Rivals)
- Better UI-scaling on high-DPI displays
- Async connection and workqueues for the virtual remote interface
- Much improved throughput and stability of intra-process communication and command-line interface
